channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Samsung Brings Android 16 To Galaxy Z Fold 7 In Record Time
item.description: The latest Samsung smartphone comes pre-loaded with the newest Android release — and is the company’s fastest software update.

item.title: Joint Blood Drive Highlights Need For Pets And People To Donate Blood
item.description: The American Red Cross of Tennessee and BluePearl Pet Blood Bank are partnering for a blood drive to save lives of both people and pets.

item.title: NVIDIA Just Hit $4 Trillion, But The Real AI Boom Hasn’t Started Yet
item.description: NVIDIA's historic $4 trillion milestone reveals three business revolutions: AI employees, smart robots, intelligence infrastructure. Why every company...

item.title: Four Keys To Successfully Launching AI In Life Sciences
item.description: AI is reshaping life sciences. Learn how compliant, explainable, and genuinely useful systems move from pilot to scale and deliver real outcomes.

item.title: Why We Need Double Literacy To Life In A Hybrid World
item.description: We need double literacy to thrive in a hybrid world. The future is too complex for either-or, artificial or natural intelligence perception planning.

item.title: Publicity or public relations?

item.title: The future doesn’t care
item.description: It doesn’t care whether you’re excited or filled with trepidation. It arrives, regardless. What an opportunity. Or a threat. Up to us.

item.title: Not smart vs. stupid
